blocks:
<xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml">
  <block type="forever" x="50" y="50">
    <statement name="DO">
      <block type="blink_led">
        <field name="PIN">2</field>
        <field name="INTERVAL">500</field>
        <next>
          <block type="oled_print">
            <value name="TEXT">
              <block type="read_pot">
                <field name="PIN">A0</field>
              </block>
            </value>
            <next>
              <block type="serial_print">
                <value name="TEXT">
                  <block type="read_pot">
                    <field name="PIN">A0</field>
                  </block>
                </value>
                <next>
                  <block type="controls_if">
                    <value name="IF0">
                      <block type="read_button">
                        <field name="PIN">3</field>
                      </block>
                    </value>
                    <statement name="DO0">
                      <block type="led_onoff">
                        <field name="PIN">2</field>
                        <field name="STATE">HIGH</field>
                        <next>
                          <block type="wait_ms">
                            <field name="DELAY">1000</field>
                            <next>
                              <block type="led_onoff">
                                <field name="PIN">2</field>
                                <field name="STATE">LOW</field>
                              </block>
                            </next>
                          </block>
                        </next>
                      </block>
                    </statement>
                  </block>
                </next>
              </block>
            </next>
          </block>
        </next>
      </block>
    </statement>
  </block>
</xml>
